thread.title: Prachur Jaiswal
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Prachur Jaiswal

author: Prachur Jaiswal
title: Prachur Jaiswal
text: I purchased bed , mattress and box spring on 3/4/2017 and got it delivered on 3/5/2017. The overall height of the bed is too high after the assembly and it is uncomfortable to sit on top it. I complained on Auburn Hills office on 3/6/2017 and the representative told me to exchange box spring with a low height one would cost me $200 (full price).
